channel.title: Another noob question
channel.description:
do not flame please-DO NOT FLAME, WE WERE ALL ONCE NOOBS-
wheres the linerar dodge tool???

item.title: Another noob question
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

fellixombc:

true, lol, you caught me, i think google sucks…personaly, i can never find good tutorials for stuff

well, i always find good tutorials on google, you must be searching somthing else?

item.title: Another noob question
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:4, topic:64248”][quote author=xxlegitxx link=topic=93122.msg971674#msg971674 date=1173060250]

Linear dodge, that is a style of layer, like overlay, or soft light, it is up there somwhere.

I think he means the Dodge Tool. Its the pin-like thing that is by the burn tool… and fellixombc, you should specify that it’s ps.

EDIT: And honestly, you expect us not to flame? First of all, you asked us not to flame. That’s basically asking us to flame. Second of all, not all of us were noobs. Third, noobs actually know how to use google. Just type in ‘dodge tool photoshop’ and you get thousands of links…
[/quote]

nah, i just didn’t have spare time[/quote]

apparently you had time to wait for someone to reply on here with an answer which took almost 6 hours -.-

Read full topic
